summary: This is an internal email from August 12, 2019, detailing the timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and housing status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from his arrival on July 6, 2019, until July 23, 2019. It notes his initial placement in general population, subsequent moves to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and Psychology Observation, and the assessment that suicide watch was not warranted.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The high-profile inmate whose housing and safety are being tracked from his arrival at the facility on July 6, 2019, through July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The warden of the institution who became aware of Epstein's high-profile status and was involved in discussions about his housing.

connections.description: The Warden is responsible for the institution where Epstein is incarcerated and was involved in managing his housing due to safety concerns.

events.title: Epstein arrives at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) in New York on a Saturday and was placed in the Receiving and Discharge area before being moved to general population.

events.title: Moved to Special Housing Unit (SHU)
events.description: Epstein was moved to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to concerns for his personal safety in the general population.

events.title: Placed in Psychology Observation
events.description: Upon the return of Psychology Service staff, Epstein was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation.

events.title: Suicide watch assessment
events.description: Psychology Service staff assessed Epstein and determined suicide watch was not warranted, though he remained under 24-hour observation.

events.title: Returned to SHU with cell mate
events.description: Epstein was returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) with a cell mate, where he remained until July 23, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 6, 2019, and was initially placed in general population.
Staff were not initially made aware of Epstein's high-profile status and associated safety concerns.
Due to safety concerns, Epstein was moved to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on July 7, 2019, and later to Psychology Observation for evaluation on July 8, 2019.
On July 9, 2019, Psychology Service staff assessed Epstein and determined suicide watch was not warranted, though he was under 24-hour observation.
Epstein was returned to the SHU with a cell mate on July 10, 2019, and remained there until at least July 23, 2019.
